### multi-cycle memories  {.smaller}


* ideal case for memories: single-cycle
* achieved with <em>caches</em> (next topic) 

   * fast access to small number of things
 
<hr class="vspace" />
* typical performance: 

   * 90+% of the time: single-cycle

* sometimes many cycles (3--400+)

### againframe(missingPieces)

### beyond pipelining: multiple issue  {.smaller}



* start <em>more than one instruction/cycle</em>
* multiple parallel pipelines; many-input/output register file
* <em>hazard handling much more complex</em>
 ![](/caching/texfig/multiIssueIntro.figure.svg)


### beyond pipelining: out-of-order  {.smaller}



* find <em>later instructions to do</em> instead of stalling
* lists of available instructions in pipeline registers 

   * take any instruction with available values

* provide <em>illusion that work is still done in order</em>  

   * much more complicated hazard handling logic

 ![](/caching/texfig/oooIntro.figure.svg)
